languages.text: "Если бы ты не {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}спас{mf||ла} мои легкие{/d}, шерин, я бы тебе хорошенько врезала. Один хрен в Комморре сидим — помрем, как пить дать. Ну да пускай, смейся надо мной. Пока ажи тебе смеялку не заткнули". {n}Джай обиженно кривится, кажется, впервые за все время знакомства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Если бы ты не спас{mf||ла} мои легкие, шерин, я бы тебе хорошенько врезала. Один хрен в Комморре сидим — помрем, как пить дать. Ну да пускай, смейся надо мной. Пока ажи тебе смеялку не заткнули". {n}Джай обиженно кривится, кажется, впервые за все время знакомства.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если бы ты не {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}спас{mf||ла} мои легкие{/d}, шерин, я бы тебе хорошенько врезала. Один хрен в Комморре сидим — помрем, как пить дать. Ну да пускай, смейся надо мной. Пока ажи тебе смеялку не заткнули". {n}Джай обиженно кривится, кажется, впервые за все время знакомства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Had you not saved my lungs, shereen, I would have punched you right in the kisser. We are as good as dead now that we have landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue." {n}Jae scrunches her face, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you know her.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “要不是因为你{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}救了我一命{/d}，亲爱的，我肯定会给你一拳。咱们现在落在了科摩罗，和死了也差不多。行吧，你想怎么嘲笑我都可以，当心鬼怪把你那条刻薄的舌头扯出来。”{n}婕伊脸上露出了痛苦的表情。自从你认识她以来，这似乎是她第一次被伤到。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “要不是因为你救了我一命，亲爱的，我肯定会给你一拳。咱们现在落在了科摩罗，和死了也差不多。行吧，你想怎么嘲笑我都可以，当心鬼怪把你那条刻薄的舌头扯出来。”{n}婕伊脸上露出了痛苦的表情。自从你认识她以来，这似乎是她第一次被伤到。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "If you hadn't saved my lungs, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}

languages.text: «De no haber {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}salvado mis pulmones{/d}, shereen, le daría un puñetazo en el estómago. Ahora que hemos caído en Commorragh, estamos prácticamente muert{mf|o|a}s. Ríase de mí todo lo que quiera antes de que los azhi le arranquen esa lengua socarrona». {n}La mueca de Jae revela que está realmente dolida, seguramente por primera vez desde que la conoces.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «De no haber salvado mis pulmones, shereen, le daría un puñetazo en el estómago. Ahora que hemos caído en Commorragh, estamos prácticamente muert{mf|o|a}s. Ríase de mí todo lo que quiera antes de que los azhi le arranquen esa lengua socarrona». {n}La mueca de Jae revela que está realmente dolida, seguramente por primera vez desde que la conoces.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}肺を救ってくれなかったら{/d}、あたしはぶん殴っていただろうね。コモラフに着陸した以上、あたしらは死んだも同然さ。アジーに舌を引き抜かれる前に、好きなだけ私を馬鹿にするといいわ」{n}ジェイは苦笑いを浮かべながらも、あなたが彼女と知り合って以来初めてと思われる、純粋に傷ついた様子で言った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あんたが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}肺を救ってくれなかったら{/d}、あたしはぶん殴っていただろうね。コモラフに着陸した以上、あたしらは死んだも同然さ。アジーに舌を引き抜かれる前に、好きなだけ私を馬鹿にするといいわ」{n}ジェイは苦笑いを浮かべながらも、あなたが彼女と知り合って以来初めてと思われる、純粋に傷ついた様子で言った。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hättet Ihr mir nicht {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}die Lungen gerettet{/d}, Shereen, würde ich Euch dafür in die Fresse hauen. Wir sind so gut tot, nachdem wir jetzt in Commorragh gelandet sind. Schön, verspottet mich, so viel Ihr wollt, ehe die Azhi Euch Eure schändliche Zunge herausreißen"{n}, sagt Jae und verzieht das Gesicht. Sie ist das erste Mal, seit du sie kennst, offenbar ehrlich verletzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hättet Ihr mir nicht die Lungen gerettet, Shereen, würde ich Euch dafür in die Fresse hauen. Wir sind so gut tot, nachdem wir jetzt in Commorragh gelandet sind. Schön, verspottet mich, so viel Ihr wollt, ehe die Azhi Euch Eure schändliche Zunge herausreißen"{n}, sagt Jae und verzieht das Gesicht. Sie ist das erste Mal, seit du sie kennst, offenbar ehrlich verletzt.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous n'aviez pas {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}sauvé mes poumons{/d}, shereen, je vous flanquerais mon poing dans la figure. On est {mf|coincés|coincées} à Commorragh et je ne vois pas d'échappatoire. Mais allez-y, moquez-vous de moi autant que vous voudrez avant que les azhi vous arrachent la langue, » {n}lance Jae en grimaçant, sincèrement blessée pour ce qui vraisemblablement la première fois depuis que vous la connaissez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si vous n'aviez pas sauvé mes poumons, shereen, je vous flanquerais mon poing dans la figure. On est {mf|coincés|coincées} à Commorragh et je ne vois pas d'échappatoire. Mais allez-y, moquez-vous de moi autant que vous voudrez avant que les azhi vous arrachent la langue, » {n}lance Jae en grimaçant, sincèrement blessée pour ce qui vraisemblablement la première fois depuis que vous la connaissez.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Eğer {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}ciğerlerimi kurtarmamış{/d} olsaydın şirinim, sümsüğü ağzının ortasına indirirdim. Commorragh'a indiğimizden beri ölüden farksızız. Azhi o alaycı dilini söküp atmadan önce benimle istediğin kadar dalga geç." {n}Jae, söylediklerinden gerçekten canı yanmış gibi bir hâli varmışçasına yüzünü ekşiterek konuşuyor. Onu ilk kez bu hâlde görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}saved my lungs{/d}, shereen, I'd punch you right in the gob for that. We're as good as dead now that we've landed in Commorragh. Fine, mock me all you want before the azhi rip out your mocking tongue," {n}Jae says with a grimace, genuinely hurt for what seems to be the first time since you have known her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eğer ciğerlerimi kurtarmamış olsaydın şirinim, sümsüğü ağzının ortasına indirirdim. Commorragh'a indiğimiz andan itibaren aslında ölüden farksızız. Sen bilirsin, azhi o alaycı dilini söküp atmadan önce benimle istediğin kadar dalga geç." {n}Jae yüzünü ekşiterek konuşuyor, âdeta söylediklerinden gerçekten canı yanmış gibi bir hâli var, ki onu bu hâlde ilk kez görüyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
